node.name: ExtUtils::MM_OS2 - methods to override UN*X behaviour in ExtUtils::MakeMaker
node.description: See ExtUtils::MM_Unix for a documentation of the methods provided there. This package overrides the implementation of these methods, not the semantics.
node.synopsis: use ExtUtils::MM_OS2; # Done internally by ExtUtils::MakeMaker if needed
node.title: perlman:ExtUtils::MM_OS2
